item.title: League of Legends: Wild Rift (@wildrift) on X 🎬
item.description:
Let’s see whether you can gain Polaris’ favor and receive Aurora’s gifts on December 5th UTC!
❄️ Winterblessed Diana ❄️ Winterblessed Hecarim ❄️ Winterblessed Annie ❄️ Winterblessed Nami ❄️ Winterblessed Lillia
